raw: China sends medical team to Iraq to help tackle coronavirus epidemic .

raw: Despite criticism over its initial slow response to contain the outbreak , which started in the central Chinese city of Wuhan , Beijing has repeatedly pledged to work with the WHO and other countries to tackle the outbreak .
